api hithamu…thawakalika me loke hamadeyakma ekinekata wenas…ape balaporoththun wenuwen ee dewal apita oona widihata wenas karanna apita baha…hamadeyakatama kramayak thiyanawa…chinthana shakthiya thiyana minis apita me gana tikak gambaurata hithanna puluwan…api aadaraya karana aya…eyala witharak neweyi kawru wunath eyala diha manushiyawa balann…eyalage sithum pathum wilasitha jiwitha shailiya me dewal walata garukaranna..ee bawa eyalata hagawanna..himin himin sanyamayakin eyalata yatharthaya…obe ruchi aruchikam wisthara karanna…mama hari kiyala hithanne nathiwa eyalata ahumkan denna…mamathwayen midila api kiyana hagimen hamadeyak ganama wiwruthawa hithanna…ehema goda nagena manushiya sambandhayakin oyage balaporoththu malpala ganwaganna hari pahasu wewi…

shrilankawe kalapu ha waw aashrithawa pawena awanhal idikara sancharakayanta pahasukam labadime wadapiliwelak nawika hamudawa wisin aarambha kota thibe.mehi prathama awanhala danatamath diyawanna oya aashrithawa idikaramin pawathina bawath idiri masa kihipaya athulatha dipawyapthawa me awanhal idikirimata salasumkara athayi nawika hamudapathi wayis admiral somathilaka disanayaka mahatha ‘dinamina’ta eeye (26) pawasiya.me awanhal wyapruthiya deshiya menma wideshiya sancharakayange janapriyathwayata pathwanu athi bawath memagin sancharaka karmanthayata nawa muhunuwarak ganu athi bawath nawika hamudapathiwaraya sandahan kaleya.me aakaraye sanwardhana kriyadama rasakata nawika hamudawa me wanawita idiripath wi athi bawath aarakshaka lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mahathage upades matha me siyalla sidukarana bawath nawika hamudapathiwaraya, wadiduratath sandahan kaleya..
eyayige hamine rassawak kale naha.

1982 aarambhayath samanga rupawahiniya meratata pamini than sita sinama saha nat ya ksheth raye kusalatha dakwu lankiya kalakaruwo k ramayen rupawahiniya harahada p rekshakayan amathuha. 1983-88 kalaye henri sh ri lanka rupawahini sansthawe adh yaksha janaral dhuraya hebawu athara ee kalaya thula ohuge paripalanamaya hakiyawa p rath yaksha karannata wu nisa ohuge kala dayakathwaya adu wiya.
me wanchawata sambandha aya waha helidaraw kala yuthuyayida ohu pawasiya.
api kohoma hari kiyawagannam..
eya 2016 warshayata wada miliyana 12.89ka aduwimaki. 1978ta sapekshawa gathahoth miliyana 200ka pirisak duppathkamin mudawaganimata me wanawita chinaya samath wi thibe.
